titleInfo.title: TUImod: Modular Objects for Tangible User Interfaces

mods.abstract: This paper describes the design and construction of TUImod, a modular system of basic elements generated by rapid-prototyping techniques that can be combined in various ways into human distinguishable and computer trackable physical objects with specific physical properties. The described system is used in our tangible desk environment for data exploration applications.

titleInfo.title: Proceedings of the 2008 Conference on Pervasive Computing
